Solar Incentives in Canada

Rebates, loans, tax credits, and financing available across provinces. Find what's available in your area.

Canada-wideloan

Canada Greener Homes Loan

Up to $40,000

Interest-free loan for energy-efficient retrofits including solar installations. Repay over 10 years.

Eligibility: Canadian homeowners with eligible retrofits

Learn more
Canada-widetax credit

Clean Technology Investment Tax Credit

30% refundable

Refundable tax credit for businesses investing in solar PV systems and battery storage.

Eligibility: Canadian businesses

Canada-widetax credit

Capital Cost Allowance (CCA)

Accelerated depreciation

Businesses can accelerate depreciation of solar and renewable energy equipment.

Eligibility: Canadian businesses

British Columbiarebate

BC Hydro Solar Program

Up to $5,000 ($1,000/kW)

Rebate for solar PV installations. Plus up to $5,000 for battery storage ($500/kWh). PST exemption on renewable equipment.

Eligibility: BC Hydro customers

Albertarebate

Banff Solar Production Incentive

$750/kW (max 20 kW)

Production-based incentive for solar installations in Banff.

Eligibility: Residents of Banff

Edmonton, Albertarebate

Change Homes for Climate

$0.50/watt (up to $4,000)

Rebate for solar PV installations on residential properties.

Eligibility: Edmonton homeowners

Saskatchewanfinancing

Saskatoon Home Energy Loan

$1,000 - $60,000

Financing repayable via property taxes. Covers solar and energy upgrades.

Eligibility: Saskatoon property owners

Manitobarebate

Efficiency Manitoba Solar Rebate

$500/kW (max $5,000)

Rebate for residential solar PV installations.

Eligibility: Manitoba homeowners

Manitobafinancing

Manitoba Hydro Solar Financing

Up to $20,000 at 6.2%

Low-interest financing for solar installations.

Eligibility: Manitoba Hydro customers

Ontariorebate

Home Renovation Savings Program

Up to $5,000 each

Separate rebates of up to $5,000 for solar and battery storage installations.

Eligibility: Ontario homeowners

Toronto, Ontariofinancing

Toronto HELP

Up to $125,000

Low-interest Home Energy Loan Program for solar and energy upgrades.

Eligibility: Toronto property owners

Ottawa, Ontariofinancing

Ottawa BHOLP

Up to $125,000

Better Homes Ottawa Loan Program - low-interest financing for renewables.

Eligibility: Ottawa homeowners

Incentive details and amounts may change. Always verify with official sources before applying.
